title: Ticket #6368: Improve HTCondor installation for RPM instructions
description:
1. The RPM install instructions in the HTCondor Manual do not match the RPM install instructions on the web site. Perhaps the manual repo install instructions should be removed and just point to the web site?

2. The RPM installation instructions on the web for RHEL7, even for our current stable and dev release, still talk about the need to disable SELinux at the top of the page. This is no longer true as of HTCondor v8.6.x, right?

3. The repo transfers, including grabbing the signing key, are all via http. Shouldn't it be via https ?
remarks:
2017-Aug-08 13:22:02 by tim:
Removed SELinux warning from web pages and pushed to web site.
